directions: Walk to Odeonsplatz U-Bahn (~5 min, 300m, flat)
Take U-Bahn to Hauptbahnhof, then walk to Sofitel
transportation: U3 to Hauptbahnhof (~5 min), walk 5 min (300m, flat)
thingsToDo: Enjoy travel to dinner at 1910 Restaurant & Bar (Sofitel Munich Bayerpost, Bayerstraße 12).

directions: Dine at 1910’s chic rooftop restaurant
thingsToDo: Enjoy vegetarian dinner at 1910 Restaurant & Bar.
costsAndNotes: 14-year-old likes bold flavors, 10-year-old prefers mild flatbreads

directions: Walk to Hauptbahnhof U-Bahn (~5 min, 300m, flat)
Take U-Bahn to Odeonsplatz, then walk to garden
transportation: U3 to Odeonsplatz (~5 min), walk 10 min (600m, flat)
thingsToDo: Perform activity: Travel to English Garden.
costsAndNotes: Pristine park with curated paths, ideal for evening stroll

directions: Wander Japanese Teahouse area, pristine streams
Watch Eisbachwelle surfers; grab premium gelato (€3-5)
thingsToDo: Perform activity: English Garden Evening Stroll.
costsAndNotes: Stay near teahouse to avoid deep trails

directions: Walk to Odeonsplatz U-Bahn (~10 min, 600m, flat)
Take U-Bahn to Scheidplatz, then tram to hotel
transportation: U3 to Scheidplatz (~10 min), tram 12 to Marsstraße (~5 min)
thingsToDo: Perform activity: Return to Hotel.

directions: Kids relax (Wi-Fi, TV, lounge games)
